name: fp
description: For your final project, you'll implement a course project that exhibits your mastery of the course materials.  Similar to A4, this project gives you an opportunity to be creative and to pursue individual research and learning.

scripts.watch:client: cross-env BABEL_ENV=client parcel watch src/client/index.html -d dist/client --public-url /dist
scripts.watch:server: cross-env BABEL_ENV=server parcel watch src/server/main.js -d dist/server --public-url /dist --target=node
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: cross-env BABEL_ENV=client parcel build src/client/index.html -d dist/client --public-url /dist
scripts.build:server: cross-env BABEL_ENV=server parcel build src/server/main.js -d dist/server --public-url /dist --target=node
